item.title: Pvpscape help
item.dc:creator: @willscape willscape
item.description:
@willscape wrote:

make the points += Math.floor((double)lvl + [glow=red,2,300]300[/glow] into a 500, and make the points += Math.floor((double)lvl + [glow=red,2,300]400[/glow] into 600

item.title: Pvpscape help
item.dc:creator: @heroone heroone
item.description:
@heroone wrote:

I have every thing working fine but I want to edit the stats and get the combat to be 253 and all stats 135, I know I have to change the code belew but what do I change it to thanks alot in advance, as you see I tryed to find it out I just added 235 anywere hopeing lol I hope someone can tell me.

public int getXPForLevel(int level) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= level; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 300.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); if (lvl >= level) { return output; } output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); } return 0; } public int getLevelForXP(int exp) { int points = 0; int output = 0; for (int lvl = 1; lvl <= 235; lvl++) { points += Math.floor((double)lvl + 400.0 * Math.pow(2.0, (double)lvl / 7.0)); output = (int)Math.floor(points / 4); if (output >= exp) { return lvl; } } return 235;

Read full topic
